alert.note: Alert for Giles (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 17 at 11:56PM CST until February 18 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Tennessee... Richland Creek Above Pulaski affecting Giles County. For the Richland Creek...including Pulaski...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Richland Creek Above Pulaski. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural land along the river begins * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 17.0 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to continue falling at should fall below action stage Saturday morning. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 700 AM CST.
